website_summaries.verdict: A good value on this high chair mat that stays in place and saves your floors.
pros: Can go in the washing machine
Non-slip backing keeps the cloth in place well
Good for under a kids table or high chair to catch all the food
Saves time in cleaning up after baby
cons: At 43.5" square, this mat is slightly smaller than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This may is significantly smaller than it shows in the picture. Once I put the high chair on it, there wasn’t much mat left! I had to place it to one side which didn’t protect the floor on the other three sides. Also, first use tonight and it’s already stained with the pasta sauce, even though I washed it almost straight away. A purchase I regret.
customer_reviews.author: Kasela

customer_reviews.title: This was nice, we use it in the living room for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was nice, we use it in the living room for my daughter when she eats snacks, the only downfall is that it is not water proof, so it's not really meant to use on carpet, if sonething spills on it, soaks right through. It does catch crumbs and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our toddler while he masters his eating skills. Lovely star design, grips our wood floor well to stay in place, and catches spills. Note that it is not flawless, it will catch a wet spill but you will need to still clean up shortly after otherwise it make its way through the material. It’s a great safety barrier to prevent stains on carpets/rugs. It washes well in a front loader on warm and we air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mach

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this recently to help with catching the food our 1-year-old throws from his high chair and it's perfect. I now feel more comfortable with him learning how to feed himself. 🤣🤭❤
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Nafrini

customer_reviews.title: It wipes clean easily and catches all the mess
customer_reviews.text: It's a very modern and clean look. It wipes clean easily and catches all the mess. I actually have it folded in half and it works perfectly to catch her messes off the sides of the chair without being in the way of the rest of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Volgirl

customer_reviews.title: Holds up on liquid products!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best mat to put under a high chair or to have your little one sit on to eat. No liquids have soaked through. This has also been washed on more than one occasion and is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Mama-to-a-Gem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mat, I Nanny I was looking for a mat to put under a kids table, so when they spill it lands on the mat! Great size for what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: it isn't as easy to wipe down as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's highchair. I say it's just ok because while it does catch the mess, it isn't as easy to wipe down as I thought it would be. I think it's more designed for picking it up and throwing it in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: It’s not flimsy like the other ones on the market
customer_reviews.text: Pay extra for this one. It’s made of cloth and the underside has a material that stays down to the ground. It’s not flimsy like the other ones on the market. The star design is subtle and goes with my decor
customer_reviews.author: raplake

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I expected. It stains easily which is crazy as it’s an splat mat so should withstand all foods including tomato!
customer_reviews.author: Cleshh2o

customer_reviews.title: Works great, waterproof, washes well!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, washes well in the washing machine. Just make sure to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat for under high chair!
customer_reviews.text: Good size! Easy to wash. This has saved us so much time cleaning up after our baby.
customer_reviews.author: dchap18

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using it under our bird's cage and is works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Debra BC

product_meta.title: Sumnacon Baby Splat Mat for Under High Chair Floor Protector, Reusable Washable Feeding Highchair Food Splash Spill Mats,Toddler Seat Splat and Portable Kids Play Mat (Grey)
product_meta.description:
Description:

Great for catching all the crumbs that toddler drops when eating. It is large enough to use at your dinning room table. 
Great for toddler actatives such as cutting & pasting, water colors and any kind of crafts and spills you don't want on your floors. 

This has saved your floors from loads of mess. Looks great and cleans up really easy.
Big enough to catch most of what he drops without being in the way of the rest of the family. 

These Splat Mat does excellent job at protecting floor and easy to pick it up and shake out the debris in the trash. Wipes clean for messier spills. 

It's a good size to put under your messy eater or next to since he has a tendency to drop things in one direction more than others. 

You can use this Splat Mat when you're out and put it under her play blanket, keeps her nice and clean and dry when on the grass, or in a friend's house. 

Use this matt when you are traveling or visiting friends. It lets your little one eat (where there may not be a high chair) without making a mess of the floors.
The size is great as its easy to fold and pack.

Material:

the front is Linen , the back side is anti-skid cloth 

Package:

1* Splat Mat

NOTE:
Do not come with chair
feature_bullets: Carpet Saver- it is doing it's job protecting the carpet in your dining room.This mat is SO much better than vacuuming a rug or mopping the tile every time your little baby eats. It catches all the crumbs,spills and stains, and when a meal or a snack are finished, you just need to fold up the mat,take it outside and shake it out...done! It saving your rug and makes for an easy clean up

Machine Washable- Reusable Splat Mats are machine washable, making them easy to clean. Hang or tumble dry low, and use again and again. If you are tired of mopping every night. It is exactly what you are looking for. The material can been thrown in the washer without taking up a ton of space. And, it can also go in the dryer.

Size: 43.3*43.3inch. Safety, anti-slip granules backing to hold the cover in place Position it as a diamond under the high chair so that a point comes out of each side of the chair. This optimizes coverage over potential drop zones for you. You can also purchase it to use over your fancy table cloth so your child can make a mess as he pleases.

This is perfect for toddler to use while snacking in the living room. It's a nice small size for them to sit on while watching tv and drinking his milk or snacking. Easy to fold up and take with you if needed. You can use this Splat Mat when you're out and put it under her play blanket, keeps her nice and clean and dry when on the grass, or in a friend's house.

Great mat to help with your messy eater! Fits under high chair & catches most food. This would also be a good arts craft mat as well. The design matches the décor of kitchen which is a nice thing. This is a good mat that is very durable. Balled up and pulled from end to end without losing shape or tearing. This as a good mat to put under a high chair to save your floor from spills.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars23 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
